更健康生活方式的秘诀？最近的研究表明，你的狗人狗关系对狗主人的身体活动、生活方式和健康结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/The-secret-to-a-healthier-lifestyle-Your-dog-says-recent-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/The-secret-to-a-healthier-lifestyle-Your-dog-says-recent-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5ac9795-b244-4f80-93c2-bc11bce9238b Wed, 06 Mar 2024 07:17:00 -0500 The secret to a healthier lifestyle? Your dog, says recent study
从长远来看，即使是低水平的休闲时间体力活动也可以预防中风最近，科学家进行了系统回顾和荟萃分析，以更好地了解不同水平的休闲体力活动（LTPA）是否可以预防中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Even-low-levels-of-leisure-time-physical-activity-can-prevent-中风-in-the-long-term.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Even-low-levels-of-leisure-time-physical-activity-can-prevent-中风-in-the-long-term.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef6a3dc4-ac43-4561-a940-4546f7f9c414 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:44:00 -0500 Even low levels of leisure-time physical activity can prevent stroke in the long term

作为百万人类微生物组新核心实验室，华大智造赋能INRAE MetaGenoPolis“法国微生物-法国肠道”项目，推动宏基因组学研究华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，在 MetaGenoPolis 被选为法国国家农业、食品和环境研究所 (INRAE) 后，今天宣布与法国著名的国家农业、食品和环境研究所 (INRAE) 旗下的 MetaGenoPolis 达成合作协议。百万人类微生物组项目 (MMHP) 的核心实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/As-a-new-Core-Lab-under-the-Million-Microbiomes-from-Humans-Project-MGI-empowers-INRAE-MetaGenoPolis-in- e2809cLe-microbiote-francais-Le-French-Gute2809dproject-to-Propel-Metagenomics-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/As-a-new-Core-Lab-under-the-Million-Microbiomes-from-Humans-Project-MGI-empowers-INRAE-MetaGenoPolis-in- e2809cLe-microbiote-francais-Le-French-Gute2809dproject-to-Propel-Metagenomics-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30333ea2-dced-4248-9a3a-95825ca6e2d8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:12:00 -0500 As a new Core Lab under the Million Microbiomes from Humans Project, MGI empowers INRAE MetaGenoPolis in “Le microbiote français - Le French Gut”project to Propel Metagenomics Research
华大智造与 Prepaire Labs 建立战略合作伙伴关系，共同推进药物发现和精准医疗华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，今天宣布在 2024 年中东MEDLAB 上与 Pr​​epaire Labs 合作，进一步赋能精准医疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/MGI-Enters-Strategic-Partnership-with-Prepaire-Labs-to-Advance-Drug-Discovery-and-Precision-Medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/MGI-Enters-Strategic-Partnership-with-Prepaire-Labs-to-Advance-Drug-Discovery-and-Precision-Medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddaace32-f67c-4974-b37f-d9afdd33b9d8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:06:00 -0500 MGI Enters Strategic Partnership with Prepaire Labs to Advance Drug Discovery and Precision Medicine
华大智造与 Eurofins Genomics 合作，利用革命性的 DNBSEQ-T20×2 测序仪及相关技术提升精准健康水平华大智造是一家致力于构建引领生命科学的核心工具和技术的公司，今天自豪地宣布与Eurofins Genomics Europe Genotyping A/S（“Eurofins Genomics”）达成里程碑式的合作，该公司已下达革命性DNBSEQ-T20的企业订单×2（“T20”）超高通量测序仪，以及基因组学数据中心 ZTRON Appliance 和华大智造一系列最先进的实验室自动化产品和系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/MGI-Tech-and-Eurofins-Genomics-Partner-to-Elevate-Precision-Health-with-Revolutionary-DNBSEQ-T20c3972-Sequencer-and-Related-技术.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/MGI-Tech-and-Eurofins-Genomics-Partner-to-Elevate-Precision-Health-with-Revolutionary-DNBSEQ-T20c3972-Sequencer-and-Related-技术.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38ece46d-35a0-4b74-83e0-30a533aee512 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:02:00 -0500 MGI Tech and Eurofins Genomics Partner to Elevate Precision Health with Revolutionary DNBSEQ-T20×2 Sequencer and Related Technologies
人类分子对禁食的适应：蛋白质组学分析的见解研究人员研究了人类禁食一周后的系统蛋白质组适应情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Human-molecular-adaptations-to-fasting-Insights-from-proteomic-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Human-molecular-adaptations-to-fasting-Insights-from-proteomic-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fc93eea-170b-410d-a8bc-3224350cb6ee Wed, 06 Mar 2024 06:02:00 -0500 Human molecular adaptations to fasting: Insights from proteomic analysis
拜登是对的。美国购买处方药的费用通常是其他国家的两倍。有据可查的是，美国人为医疗保健支付高昂的费用。但与世界其他地方相比，他们为处方药支付的费用是双倍还是更多呢？乔·拜登总统说他们做到了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Biden-is-right-The-US-generally-pays-double-that-of-other-countries-for-Rx-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Biden-is-right-The-US-generally-pays-double-that-of-other-countries-for-Rx-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17cafe79-2d8c-4169-92a7-399e245a5843 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 05:47:00 -0500 Biden is right. The US generally pays double that of other countries for Rx drugs.
